name: Seebeyond Technology
overview:
As of August 25, 2005, SeeBeyond Technology Corp. was acquired by Sun Microsystems Inc. SeeBeyond Technology Corp. provides business integration software worldwide. The company’s software enables the real-time flow of information within the enterprise and among customers, suppliers, and partners. Its Integrated Composite Application Network suite provides a process-driven integration platform, which offers composite application network suite for integration and composite application solutions encompassing application-to-application integration, business-to-business integration, and business process management with human work flow, portal, extract transfer and load, business activity monitoring, and composite application development capabilities. SeeBeyond Technology Corp. has strategic alliances with various independent systems integrators, including Accenture, Cap Gemini, Computer Sciences Corporation, Braxton, Electronic Data Systems Corporation, and First Consulting Group.

SeeBeyond Technology Corp. was formerly known as Software Technologies Corporation and changed its name in November 2000. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Monrovia, California.
